LanguageData.TropicalRainforest.label: hutan tropis
LanguageData.TropicalRainforest.description: hutan rimba yang lembab dan tebal, dipenuhi dengan fauna dan penyakit. Despite its visual beauty, this is a very dangerous biome. Choking overgrowth, aggressive animals, and constant sickness are why some explorers call this the "green hell".
LanguageData.TropicalSwamp.label: rawa tropis
LanguageData.TropicalSwamp.description: A plant-choked, steamy swamp seething with parasites and pathogens. Much of the land is too marshy to build on. Difficult movement, aggressive animals, and rampant disease make living here a nightmare.
